title: Strengthening Instructional Competencies: Advanced Clinical Skills Simulation Training—Spaced Repetition and Testing

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of Basic Life Support (BLS) and Advanced Life Support (ALS) procedures
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners maintain a technical accuracy rate of 85% or higher when performing BLS and ALS simulations up to three months later.
Learners improve their simulation performance ability by 20% through periodic testing over six months.
Learners apply appropriate decision-making processes with 90% accuracy in crisis situation simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
